message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,750.
